name: Connecting Columns
description:
A Puzzle made by SpectralGT. You control the columns and your goal is to transfer the electricity from the power house to the Light Bulb. You move the columns in any directions. To transfer electricity from one column to another , they have to close to each other and their path should be clear. Good Luck !

✨ Controls :-  

(R) - change the column.

(Arrow Keys / WASD) - Move the columns.
